column4: Hi, I need to remotely connect to my win computer at my office. to do that using Win I have to authenticate myself using the Aker client(where i set the offices network ip and user/pass to connect) and then accessing with the Remote Desktop Connection...Does ubuntu have some solution to do it? t.i.a
perhaps teamviewer would let you remotly connect from your ubuntu machine to the windows box at work
hellphyre I've just installed it... that ID field would be the IP right?
nope, the 6 digit id is generated by teamviewer, you will need teamviewer installed on the machine at work as well and use that 6 digit number to connect to the work machine
